title: Bitcoin ETFs Experience Surge In Net Inflows Amidst Market Volatility
description: Recent data indicates a significant uptick in net inflows into Bitcoin spot exchange-traded funds (ETFs) on March 15th, signaling heightened investor interest amidst market fluctuations.Â  On March 15th, the total net inflow of Bitcoin spot ETFs was $198 million.
